name: A Certain Scientific White Christmas
description:
とあるみこくろの恋愛感情＜ホワイトクリスマス＞

A short story between two girls, with some surprises along the way!

This is a fangame focusing on characters from the "toaru" series, made with Ren'Py in 9 days, with all assets created from scratch.

If you like cute and funny stories with interesting characters, and have 10 minutes free, try playing this game!

This game is designed to be friendly even to those unfamiliar with the series it is based on, but some references may not be understood.

It is my first game project, so please enjoy!

～あの二人の咲くはなし～

「黒子！一体、何でここに？」

そして、二人の恋愛感情＜ホワイトクリスマス＞

とあるシリーズのファンとして、この同人ゲームを作ってみました！

可愛いキャラと面白いストーリーも楽しい！

どうぞお楽しみください！

2020 BIRI_ZERO soft／でんじゆうどう
